TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbSchemaGuid extends System.Object

summary.span: 會傳回由 方法所指定之結構描述 (Schema) 資料表的型別。

span.span: Returns the type of schema table specified by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個欄位類別對應至 OLE DB 結構描述資料列。Each field in the class maps to an OLE DB schema rowset. > [!NOTE] > 某些成員類別 (例如結構描述) 可能不支援的 OLE DB 提供者。Some members of the class, (such as schema) may not be supported by your OLE DB provider. 請參閱資料庫文件，以判斷您是否可以藉由查詢資料庫的系統資料表來擷取此結構描述資訊。Refer to your database documentation to determine whether you can retrieve this schema information by querying the system tables of your database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Assertions
Public Shared ReadOnly Assertions As Guid

summary.span: 傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的判斷提示，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the assertions defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 判斷提示資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB ASSERTIONS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Catalogs
Public Shared ReadOnly Catalogs As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回可以從資料來源存取之資料庫目錄相關聯的實體屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Returns the physical attributes associated with catalogs accessible from the data source.

summary.span: 傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的判斷提示，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the assertions defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 類別目錄的資料列集，並傳回下列限制資料行。 maps to the OLE DB CATALOGS rowset and returns the following restriction column. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CATALOG_NAMECATALOG_NAME|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 不能為 null 的值。Cannot be a null value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Character_Sets
Public Shared ReadOnly Character_Sets As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的字元集 (Character Set)，此資料庫目錄可由指定使用者進行存取。

span.span: Returns the character sets defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB CHARACTER_SETS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB CHARACTER_SETS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CHARACTER_SET_CATALOGCHARACTER_SET_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMACHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CHARACTER_SET_NAMECHARACTER_SET_NAME|`string`|字元集名稱。Character set name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Check_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Check_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的檢查條件約束，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the check constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Check_Constraints_By_Table
Public Shared ReadOnly Check_Constraints_By_Table As Guid

summary.span: 傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的檢查條件約束，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the check constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Collations
Public Shared ReadOnly Collations As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的字元定序 (Collation)，此資料庫目錄可由指定使用者進行存取。

span.span: Returns the character collations defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 定序的資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB COLLATIONS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |COLLATION_CATALOGCOLLATION_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |COLLATION_SCHEMACOLLATION_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |COLLATION_NAMECOLLATION_NAME|`string`|定序名稱。Collation name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Column_Domain_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Column_Domain_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回在資料庫目錄中所定義的資料行，而資料行會相依於資料庫目錄中定義的領域，並且由指定使用者擁有。

span.span: Returns the columns defined in the catalog that are dependent on a domain defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |DOMAIN_CATALOGDOMAIN_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |DOMAIN_SCHEMADOMAIN_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |DOMAIN_NAMEDOMAIN_NAME|`string`|檢視表名稱。View name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行名稱。Column name. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是正式結構序列化至 COLUMN_NAME 資料行 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 資料列集）。(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.)|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Column_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Column_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 傳回在資料庫目錄中所定義資料表之資料行上的權限；指定之使用者可以取得或授與這些權限。

span.span: Returns the privileges on columns of tables defined in the catalog that are available to or granted by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB COLUMN_PRIVILEGES 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMN_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行名稱。Column name. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|授與的資料表中 TABLE_NAME 的權限的使用者。User that granted the privileges on the table in TABLE_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|使用者名稱 （或 「 公用 」） 來授與權限。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Columns
Public Shared ReadOnly Columns As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義之資料表的資料行 (包括檢視表)，此資料庫目錄可由指定使用者進行存取。

span.span: Returns the columns of tables (including views) defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 資料行的資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMNS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name. 傳回的資料行不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行; 的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別，則會傳回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是正式結構序列化至 COLUMN_NAME 資料行 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 資料列集）。如果可能，產生的資料行識別碼應為永久性的。(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.) If possible, the resulting column ID should be persistent. 不過，某些提供者不支援持續性識別項的資料行。However, some providers do not support persistent identifiers for columns. 基底資料表的資料行識別碼應該是在檢視底下而異。The column ID of a base table should be invariant under views.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Constraint_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Constraint_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回參考條件約束、唯一條件約束、檢查條件約束和判斷提示所使用的資料行 (定義在資料庫目錄中，並且由指定使用者所擁有)。

span.span: Returns the columns used by referential constraints, unique constraints, check constraints, and assertions, defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行名稱。Column name. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Constraint_Table_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Constraint_Table_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回參考條件約束、唯一條件約束、檢查條件約束和判斷提示所使用的資料行 (定義在資料庫目錄中，並且由指定使用者所擁有)。

span.span: Returns the tables that are used by referential constraints, unique constraints, check constraints, and assertions defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB CONSTRAINT_TABLE_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB CONSTRAINT_TABLE_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid DbInfoKeywords
Public Shared ReadOnly DbInfoKeywords As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回提供者特定之關鍵字的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of provider-specific keywords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相當於呼叫 OLE DB IDBInfo::GetKeywords 介面。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB IDBInfo::GetKeywords interface. 關鍵字的清單會傳回名為 「 關鍵字 」 的單一資料行做為 DataTable。The list of keywords is returned as a DataTable with a single column named "Keyword". 提供者傳回的每個關鍵字會在它自己在 DataTable 中的資料列。Each keyword returned by the provider will be on its own row in the DataTable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid DbInfoLiterals
Public Shared ReadOnly DbInfoLiterals As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回文字命令中所使用之提供者特定常值 (Literal) 的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of provider-specific literals used in text commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相當於呼叫 OLE DB **IDBInfo::GetLiteralInfo**介面或 ADO`Connection.OpenSchema`方法`adSchemaDBInfoLiterals`常數。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB **IDBInfo::GetLiteralInfo** interface, or the ADO `Connection.OpenSchema` method with the `adSchemaDBInfoLiterals` constant. 使用時方法，如果`schema`參數包含的值和`restrictions`參數會包含一個或多個限制產生。When using the method, if the `schema` parameter contains a value of and the `restrictions` parameter contains one or more restrictions, an is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Foreign_Keys
Public Shared ReadOnly Foreign_Keys As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回由指定使用者在資料庫目錄中定義的外部索引鍵資料行。

span.span: Returns the foreign key columns defined in the catalog by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB FOREIGN_KEYS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB FOREIGN_KEYS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PK_TABLE_CATALOGPK_TABLE_CATALOG|`string`|主索引鍵的資料表定義所在的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the primary key table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PK_TABLE_SCHEMAPK_TABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義主索引鍵資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the primary key table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PK_TABLE_NAMEPK_TABLE_NAME|`string`|主索引鍵資料表名稱。Primary key table name.| |FK_TABLE_CATALOGFK_TABLE_CATALOG|`string`|外部索引鍵的資料表定義所在的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the foreign key table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |FK_TABLE_SCHEMAFK_TABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義外部索引鍵資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the foreign key table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |FK_TABLE_NAMEFK_TABLE_NAME|`string`|外部索引鍵資料表名稱。Foreign key table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Indexes
Public Shared ReadOnly Indexes As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的索引，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the indexes defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 索引資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB INDEXES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |INDEX_NAMEINDEX_NAME|`string`|索引名稱。Index name.| |TYPETYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|索引的類型。The type of the index. 下列其中一項：One of the following:

是 DBPROPVAL_IT_BTREE 索引 B +-樹狀目錄中。DBPROPVAL_IT_BTREE-The index is a B+-tree.

DBPROPVAL_IT_HASH 索引是雜湊檔案使用，例如，線性或可延伸的雜湊。DBPROPVAL_IT_HASH-The index is a hash file using, for example, linear or extensible hashing.

DBPROPVAL_IT_CONTENT 索引是內容的索引。DBPROPVAL_IT_CONTENT-The index is a content index.

DBPROPVAL_IT_OTHER 索引是索引的其他類型。DBPROPVAL_IT_OTHER-The index is some other type of index.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Key_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Key_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的資料行，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者以條件約束為索引鍵。

span.span: Returns the columns defined in the catalog that is constrained as keys by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB KEY_COLUMN_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB KEY_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|包含索引鍵資料行的資料表定義所在的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table containing the key column is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|包含索引鍵資料行的資料表定義所在的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table containing the key column is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|包含索引鍵資料行的資料表名稱。Table name containing the key column.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行參與唯一、 主要或外部索引鍵的名稱。Name of the column participating in the unique, primary, or foreign key. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是正式結構序列化至 COLUMN_NAME 資料行 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 資料列集）。(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.)|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Primary_Keys
Public Shared ReadOnly Primary_Keys As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回由指定使用者在資料庫目錄中定義的主索引鍵資料行。

span.span: Returns the primary key columns defined in the catalog by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB PRIMARY_KEYS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB PRIMARY_KEYS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedure_Columns
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedure_Columns As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回由程序所傳回資料列集之資料行的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the columns of rowsets returned by procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB PROCEDURE_COLUMNS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURE_COLUMNS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|程序名稱。Procedure name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|資料行; 的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別，則會傳回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此資料行，以及 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 資料行，會形成資料行識別碼。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 一或多個這些資料行，將會為 null 的值，根據 DBID 結構項目提供者使用。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| > [!NOTE] > 出貨 MDAC 2.7 版中的任何 OLE DB 提供者不支援結構描述。The schema is not supported by any OLE DB providers that ship in MDAC version 2.7. 請參閱資料庫文件，以判斷您是否可以藉由查詢資料庫的系統資料表來擷取此結構描述資訊。Refer to your database documentation to determine whether you can retrieve this schema information by querying the system tables of your database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedure_Parameters
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedure_Parameters As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回程序的參數和傳回碼 (Return Code) 的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the parameters and return codes of procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB PROCEDURE_PARAMETERS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURE_PARAMETERS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|結構描述名稱。Schema name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|程序名稱。Procedure name.| |PARAMETER_NAMEPARAMETER_NAME|`string`|參數名稱。Parameter name. 如果參數不是 null 值。A null value if the parameter is not named.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedures
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedures As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的程序，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the procedures defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 程序的資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|程序名稱。Procedure name.| |PROCEDURE_TYPEPROCEDURE_TYPE|`UInt16`|DB_PT_UNKNOWN It 不知道是否有傳回的值。DB_PT_UNKNOWN-It is not known whether there is a returned value.

DB_PT_PROCEDURE 程序。沒有傳回的值。DB_PT_PROCEDURE-Procedure; there is no returned value.

DB_PT_FUNCTION 函式。沒有傳回的值。DB_PT_FUNCTION-Function; there is a returned value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Provider_Types
Public Shared ReadOnly Provider_Types As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回 .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 所支援的基底資料型別。

span.span: Returns the base data types supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB PROVIDER_TYPES 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB PROVIDER_TYPES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |DATA_TYPEDATA_TYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|資料類型的指標。The indicator of the data type.| |BEST_MATCHBEST_MATCH|`Int16`|VARIANT_TRUE 的資料類型為資料存放區中的所有資料類型與 DATA_TYPE 資料行中的值所指定的 OLE DB 資料類型之間的最符合項目。VARIANT_TRUE-The data type is the best match between all data types in the data store and the OLE DB data type indicated by the value in the DATA_TYPE column.

VARIANT_FALSE 的資料類型不是最符合項目。VARIANT_FALSE-The data type is not the best match. 針對每個在其中 DATA_TYPE 資料行的值是相同的資料列集，BEST_MATCH 資料行中只有一個資料列將設定為 VARIANT_TRUE。For each set of rows in which the value of the DATA_TYPE column is the same, the BEST_MATCH column is set to VARIANT_TRUE in only one row.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Referential_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Referential_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的參考條件約束，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the referential constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid SchemaGuids
Public Shared ReadOnly SchemaGuids As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回結構描述資料列集的清單 (由該資料列集的 GUID 辨識) 和指向限制資料行描述的指標。

span.span: Returns a list of schema rowsets, identified by their GUIDs, and a pointer to the descriptions of the restriction columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相當於呼叫 OLE DB **idbschemarowset:: Getschemas**介面。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB **IDBSchemaRowset::GetSchemas** interface. 結構描述和限制的清單會傳回名為 「 結構描述 」 和 「 RestrictionSupport"的兩個資料行做為 DataTable。The list of schemas and restrictions are returned as a DataTable with two columns named "Schema" and "RestrictionSupport". 結構描述 GUID 和限制位元遮罩提供者傳回的每個組合會在其上的資料列在 DataTable 中。Each combination of schema GUID and restriction bitmask returned by the provider will be on its on row in the DataTable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Schemata
Public Shared ReadOnly Schemata As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回由指定使用者所擁有的結構描述物件。

span.span: Returns the schema objects that are owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB SCHEMATAS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB SCHEMATAS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CATALOG_NAMECATALOG_NAME|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |SCHEMA_NAMESCHEMA_NAME|`string`|不合格結構描述名稱Unqualified schema name| |SCHEMA_OWNERSCHEMA_OWNER|`string`|擁有結構描述的使用者。User that owns the schemas.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Sql_Languages
Public Shared ReadOnly Sql_Languages As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回由資料庫目錄中定義的 SQL 實作處理資料所支援的一致性層級、選項和用語。

span.span: Returns the conformance levels, options, and dialects supported by the SQL-implementation processing data defined in the catalog.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB SQL_LANGUAGES 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB SQL_LANGUAGES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |SQL_LANGUAGE_SOURCESQL_LANGUAGE_SOURCE|`string`|標準的 「 ISO 9075"SQL。"ISO 9075" for standard SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_YEARSQL_LANGUAGE_YEAR|`string`|「 1992"ANSI SQL 92 – 標準 sql。"1992" for ANSI SQL-92–compliant SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_CONFORMANCESQL_LANGUAGE_CONFORMANCE|`string`|下列其中之一: 「 項目 」、 「 中繼 」 或 「 完整 」。One of the following: "ENTRY", "INTERMEDIATE", or "FULL".| |SQL_LANGUAGE_INTEGRITYSQL_LANGUAGE_INTEGRITY|`string`|"YES"= 選擇性支援完整性功能。"YES"= Optional integrity feature is supported.

[否] = 選擇性完整性功能不支援。"NO"=Optional integrity feature is not supported.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_IMPLEMENTATIONSQL_LANGUAGE_IMPLEMENTATION|`string`|NULL"iso 9075 」 實作。NULL for "ISO 9075" implementation.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_BINDING_STYLESQL_LANGUAGE_BINDING_STYLE|`string`|C/c + + 可呼叫的 「 直接 」 直接 SQL 的執行。"DIRECT" for C/C++ callable direct execution of SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGESQL_LANGUAGE_PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE|`string`|NULL。NULL.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Statistics
Public Shared ReadOnly Statistics As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的統計資料，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the statistics defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 統計資料資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB STATISTICS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的資料表條件約束，此資料庫目錄是由指定使用者所擁有。

span.span: Returns the table constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB TABLE_CONSTRAINTS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|條件約束名稱。Constraint name.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |CONSTRAINT_TYPECONSTRAINT_TYPE|`string`|條件約束的型別。Constraint type. 下列其中之一： 唯一的主索引鍵、 外部索引鍵或檢查。One of the following: UNIQUE, PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, or CHECK.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回指定使用者可以取得或授與的資料表權限 (定義在資料庫目錄中)。

span.span: Returns the privileges on tables defined in the catalog that are available to, or granted by, a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB TABLE_PRIVILEGES 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定義資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定義資料表的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|授與的資料表中 TABLE_NAME 的權限的使用者。User that granted the privileges on the table in TABLE_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|使用者名稱 （或 「 公用 」） 來授與權限。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Statistics
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Statistics As Guid

summary.span: 描述在提供者中可以取得之資料表上的統計資料集。

span.span: Describes the available set of statistics on tables in the provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB TABLE_STATISTICS 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_STATISTICS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|此統計資料之資料表的目錄名稱。Catalog name of the table of this statistic. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|資料表的結構描述名稱。Schema name of the table. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.| |STATISTICS_CATALOGSTATISTICS_CATALOG|`string`|統計資料的目錄名稱。Catalog name of the statistic. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |STATISTICS_SCHEMASTATISTICS_SCHEMA|`string`|統計資料的結構描述名稱。Schema name of the statistic. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |STATISTICS_NAMESTATISTICS_NAME|`string`|統計資料的名稱。Name of the statistic.| |STATISTICS_TYPESTATISTICS_TYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|指定受到這項統計資料的統計資料種類的位元遮罩：Bitmask specifying the kinds of statistics supported by this statistic:

DBSTAT_HISTOGRAM — 指出長條圖支援。DBSTAT_HISTOGRAM—Indicates histogram support.

DBSTAT_COLUMN_CARDINALITY — 指出資料行基數支援。DBSTAT_COLUMN_CARDINALITY— Indicates column cardinality support.

DBSTAT_TUPLE_CARDINALITY — 表示 tuple 基數支援。DBSTAT_TUPLE_CARDINALITY—Indicates tuple cardinality support.

`Note:` 長條圖會對應至僅多重資料行統計資料的第一個資料行。`Note:` Histograms correspond to only the first column for a multi-column statistic.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Tables
Public Shared ReadOnly Tables As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回指定使用者可以存取的資料庫目錄中所定義的資料表 (包括檢視表)。

span.span: Returns the tables (including views) defined in the catalog that are accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 資料表資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name. 傳回的資料行不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.| |TABLE_TYPETABLE_TYPE|`string`|資料表類型。Table type. 下列的提供者特定值的其中一個: 「 別名 」、 「 資料表 」 「 同義字 」、 「 系統資料表 」、 「 檢視 」、 「 全域暫存 」、 「 本機暫存 」，或 「 系統檢視 」。One of the following or a provider-specific value: "ALIAS", "TABLE" "SYNONYM", "SYSTEM TABLE", "VIEW", "GLOBAL TEMPORARY", "LOCAL TEMPORARY", or "SYSTEM VIEW". 傳回的資料行不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Tables_Info
Public Shared ReadOnly Tables_Info As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回指定使用者可以存取的資料表 (包括檢視表)。

span.span: Returns the tables (including views) that are accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB TABLES_INFO 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLES_INFO rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_TYPETABLE_TYPE|`string`|資料表類型。Table type. 下列的提供者特定值的其中一個： 別名、 資料表、 同義字、 系統資料表、 檢視、 全域暫存、 本機暫存、 外部資料表或系統檢視表。One of the following or a provider-specific value: ALIAS, TABLE, SYNONYM, SYSTEM TABLE, VIEW, GLOBAL TEMPORARY, LOCAL TEMPORARY, EXTERNAL TABLE, or SYSTEM VIEW.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|資料表名稱。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Translations
Public Shared ReadOnly Translations As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的字元轉譯，此資料庫目錄可由指定使用者進行存取。

span.span: Returns the character translations defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 翻譯的資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB TRANSLATIONS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TRANSLATION_CATALOGTRANSLATION_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TRANSLATION_SCHEMATRANSLATION_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TRANSLATION_NAMETRANSLATION_NAME|`string`|翻譯的名稱。Translation name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Trustee
Public Shared ReadOnly Trustee As Guid

summary.span: 識別資料來源中所定義的信任項 (Trustee)。

span.span: Identifies the trustees defined in the data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 信任者結構描述。 maps to the OLE DB TRUSTEE schema. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TRUSTEE_NAMETRUSTEE_NAME|`string`|信任者的名稱。Trustee name.| |TRUSTEE_GUIDTRUSTEE_GUID|`guid`|可唯一識別信任者的 GUID。GUID that uniquely identifies the trustee. 執行不使用 Guid 來識別信任者的提供者應傳回 null 值，這個資料行中。Providers that do no use GUIDs to identify trustees should return a null value in this column.| |TRUSTEE_PROPIDTRUSTEE_PROPID|`UInt32 (Int64)`|可唯一識別信任者的 PropID。PropID that uniquely identifies the trustee. 請勿使用 PropIDs 來識別信任者的提供者應傳回 null 值，這個資料行中。Providers that do not use PropIDs to identify trustees should return a null value in this column.| |TRUSTEE_TYPETRUSTEE_TYPE|`UInt32 (Int64)`|信任者類型。Trustee type. 下列其中一項：One of the following:

TRUSTEE_IS_UNKNOWN-之信任項目是未知的類型，但不是一定是無效的類型。TRUSTEE_IS_UNKNOWN - The trustee is an unknown type, but not necessarily an invalid type.

TRUSTEE_IS_USER-信任帳戶是使用者帳戶。TRUSTEE_IS_USER - The trustee account is a user account.

TRUSTEE_IS_GROUP-之信任項目是群組帳戶。TRUSTEE_IS_GROUP - The trustee is a group account.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Usage_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Usage_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 傳回指定之使用者可以取得或授與的物件 USAGE 權限 (定義在資料庫目錄中)。

span.span: Returns the USAGE privileges on objects defined in the catalog that are available to or granted by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB USAGE_PRIVILEGES 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB USAGE_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |OBJECT_CATALOGOBJECT_CATALOG|`string`|定義物件的類別目錄名稱。Catalog name in which the object is defined. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |OBJECT_SCHEMAOBJECT_SCHEMA|`string`|定義物件的不合格結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name in which the object is defined. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |OBJECT_NAMEOBJECT_NAME|`string`|物件名稱。Object name.| |OBJECT_TYPEOBJECT_TYPE|`string`|物件類型。Object type. 下列其中之一： 網域、 字元集，定序或轉譯。One of the following: DOMAIN, CHARACTER SET, COLLATION, or TRANSLATION.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|授與 OBJECT_NAME 中的物件上的權限的使用者。User that granted the privileges on the object in OBJECT_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|使用者名稱 （或 「 公用 」） 來授與權限。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid View_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly View_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 傳回所檢視資料表 (定義在資料庫目錄中，並且由指定使用者所擁有) 相依的資料行。

span.span: Returns the columns on which viewed tables depend, as defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB VIEW_COLUMN_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEW_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |VIEW_CATALOGVIEW_CATALOG|字串string|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |VIEW_SCHEMAVIEW_SCHEMA|字串string|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |VIEW_NAMEVIEW_NAME|字串string|檢視表名稱。View name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid View_Table_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly View_Table_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回所檢視資料表 (定義在資料庫目錄中，並且由指定使用者所擁有) 是相依的資料表。

span.span: Returns the tables on which viewed tables, defined in the catalog and owned by a given user, are dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB VIEW_TABLE_USAGE 資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEW_TABLE_USAGE rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |VIEW_CATALOGVIEW_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |VIEW_SCHEMAVIEW_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |VIEW_NAMEVIEW_NAME|`string`|檢視表名稱。View name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Views
Public Shared ReadOnly Views As Guid

summary.span: 會傳回資料庫目錄中所定義的檢視表，此資料庫目錄可由指定使用者進行存取。

span.span: Returns the views defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 OLE DB 檢視資料列集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEWS rowset. 除非另行指定，會依下列順序傳回限制資料行。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制資料行Restriction column|CLR 資料型別CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目錄名稱。Catalog name. 如果提供者不支援目錄，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|不合格的結構描述名稱。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|檢視表名稱。View name.|
